properties.areaDesc: Greater Portland Metro Area; Greater Vancouver Area; Central Willamette Valley; South  Willamette Valley
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 5:45AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
At 540 AM, a mixture of rain and wet snow was moving through
portions of the Greater Portland and Vancouver metro area and
Willamette Valley. While most of the accumulating snow is expected
to remain above 1000 feet, there could be some slick surfaces at
lower elevations during the morning commute.

Give yourself extra travel time and distance between vehicles as
roads may be icy; especially on secondary roads and overpasses in
outlying areas. Remember to check tripcheck.com for up to date
road conditions in Oregon, and wsdot.com for Washington.

NWSheadline: RAIN/SNOW MIX COULD CREATE SOME SLICK SURFACES THIS MORNING
